1.text: Mix avocado and honey to help hydrate dry skin.

2.text: Use lemon and olive oil to exfoliate and hydrate your skin in one go.

3.text: Scrub off dead skin with a mix of brown sugar and coconut oil.

4.text: Add orange juice to a mashed banana for glowing skin.

5.text: Combine papaya and honey to even out your pigmentation.

6.text: Combine yogurt and honey for an anti-inflammatory mask.

7.text: Achieve softer skin with a mask of strawberries and yogurt.

8.text: Stir orange juice and egg whites together to shrink your pores.

9.text: Blend cucumber and yogurt together to soothe your skin.

10.text: Get rid of blemishes with a honey and chamomile mask.
